text: Thomas Alvard (1493-1535) was an Ipswich merchant who entered into service with Thomas Wolsey and the Crown. He served as Member of Parliament for Ipswich. ==References== Category:1493 births Category:1535 deaths Category:Medieval English merchants Category:Members of the Parliament of England (pre-1707) for Ipswich
title: Thomas Alvard (1493-1535)
